Generation VII.Sun: This guardian deity of Akala is guilelessly cruel. The fragrant aroma of flowers is the source of its energy.
Generation VII.Moon: As it flutters about, it scatters its strangely glowing scales. Touching them is said to restore good health on the spot.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It heals the wounds of people and Pokémon by sprinkling them with its sparkling scales. This guardian deity is worshiped on Akala.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Although called a guardian deity, Tapu Lele is devoid of guilt about its cruel disposition and can be described as nature incarnate.

Generation VII.Sun: Ruins of Life (after becoming Champion ) ( Only one )
Generation VII.Moon: Ruins of Life (after becoming Champion ) ( Only one )
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Ruins of Life (after becoming Champion ) ( Only one )
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Ruins of Life (after becoming Champion ) ( Only one )

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) ( Only one )
